0.0.5.notes:
Bot overhaul
Rewritten on Cyclone Engine: https://github.com/mets11rap/cyclone-engine

0.0.4.notes:
Fixed something in the help menu
Added the room invite command
Optimized the database getting system to be faster and more efficient
Made the shards command more efficient
Code improvements

0.0.3.notes:
Updated database system
Changed the way rooms store data
Improved flexibility of ping command to make possibility for sharding
Added 2 commands:
  dblwidget
  shards
General code improvements
Compensated for guild/channel deletion while bot is offline
Fixed the help menu

0.0.2.notes:
Changed room edit to room pass
Fixed an error in the updates
Added room channel
Improved some code with functions
Fixed bug when joining and setting a designated channel
Revamped the room system
Fixed bug with kicking
Added player icon and status to the find command
--- WARNING: This build can be unstable due to the system revamp. PLEASE report any bugs found.
